channel.title: Help npcs wont die!
channel.description: Hi, i have no problems occur when i compile but somewhere i have messed up as non of my npcs will die, for example i kill a guard in varrock, it should die but no.. it just stays still dont die at all, i have been to many tuts etc editing my server so i reckon some animations or something has been removed by accident... i know the npcs should die as i tried on the same source but without any editing. Could anyone trustworthy, familiar with animations etc please add my msn kierantaylor123@hotmail.co.uk i can provide u with the faulty server source and the one which works. THANK YOU ;)

item.title: Help npcs wont die!
item.dc:creator: @kierant kierant
item.description:
@kierant wrote:

Nope it didnt work, i hit the exact number in which the npc has and yet i didnt see it die, it just stood still, can someone very skill add my msn please

Read full topic

item.title: Help npcs wont die!
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Go into npc.cfg and change their hp.
And they will die, they just have like 5k hp.

Read full topic
